description: A judgment that does not include any financial compensation.
A judgment granting a financial payment without additional relief.
A judgment providing financial compensation along with other legal remedies.
A court order requiring a party to do or refrain from doing a specific act.
A judgment resulting in the loss of property or rights due to legal action.
A judgment awarding reimbursement for court-related expenses without additional damages.
A judgment granting reimbursement for legal expenses, including attorney fees.
